text: William John Terence Neill (8 May 1942 â€“ 28 July 2022) was a Northern Irish football player and manager. He was known for playing and managing Hull City, Tottenham Hotspur, and Northern Ireland. Neill died on 28 July 2022, at the age of 80. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Northern Irish footballers Category:Northern Irish football managers Category:Sportspeople from Belfast
